text: Hanki ana kenutamimofonkura anage huno zmasami'ne, Mopafima me'nea tra'zana eri havizana osuge, zafasinage huno me'nea tra'zana eri havizana osuge, zafa eri havizana osiho. Hianagi Anumzamo'ma hunagru hu'nea avame'zama kokovite'ma rukamare onte'nesia vahe'mokizmige zamazeri havizana hiho hu'ne.
